title: NLFS T204 Ramly Arellanes and Stahl, both SGC 4
author: YazFenway08

posts.post_title: NLFS T204 Ramly Arellanes and Stahl, both SGC 4
posts.post_content:
just gorgeous cards in their SGC 4 black tuxedos

clean and nicely centered, bold “ramly” backs

not sure i am interpreting the SGC pop report correctly between “new” and “old” databases,  but regardless only a handful of these two cards in this condition or higher…like mid single digit-level population

Arellanes SGC 4 $595 shipped

Stahl SGC 4 $595 shipped

both for $1000 shipped 

net PayPal Please
Is the Stahl still available? Message if easier. Thanks
